title: Alzheimer’s treatment may soon be home-injectable
summary: Drug could offer weekly at-home injections, simplifying treatment and potentially slowing cognitive decline in early Alzheimer’s patients. Battling Alzheimer’s every day can feel like a battle against time. Doctor visits, hospital trips and IV infusions are part of a routine that is draining and often stressful. But a new development may soon change that narrative. […] The post Alzheimer’s treatment may soon be home-injectable appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
